fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Kill a player with your epic investigating skills.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you sucessfully kill will give you a list of the following:
- Role and Will (if cleaned)
- What they did each night.
- Who visited them each night.
- What each visitor to them did, similar to spy bug.
- Any roles they were before if converted.
